original_text: while the army of the king of Babylon was fighting against Jerusalem and the other cities of Judah that were still holding out—Lachish and Azekah. These were the only fortified cities left in Judah.
korean_text: 그 때에 바벨론의 왕의 군대가 예루살렘과 유다의 남은 모든 성읍들을 쳤으니 곧 라기스와 아세가라 유다의 견고한 성읍 중에 이것들만 남았음이더라

sentences.original_text: while the army of the king of Babylon was fighting
against Jerusalem and the other cities of Judah
that were still holding out—Lachish and Azekah
These were the only fortified cities left in Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들이 유다에 남아있는 유일한 요새 도시들이었다
